title: Collaboration Task Completed
description: Fired when a task is marked as completed.

workspaceId.description: The unique identifier of the workspace the task belongs to.

projectId.description: The unique identifier of the project the task belongs to.

completedBy.description: The unique identifier of the user who completed the task.

duration.description: Time from creation to completion in seconds.

wasOverdue.description: Whether the task was overdue at the time of completion.
